data.title: Beloved Family Show Annie, The Musical at Jean’s Playhouse in August
data.meta_description: Friday, July 28, 2017 Lincoln, NH – FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE: Beloved Family Show Annie, The Musical at Jean’s Playhouse in August Jean’s Playhouse presents Annie, The Musical written by playwright Thomas Meehan and composed by Charles Strouse. With pluck and positivity, little orphan Annie charms everyone’s hearts despite a next-to-nothing start in 1930s New York
data.meta_site_name: NCCA Jean's Playhouse - Theatre from the heart of the White Mountains of New Hampshire
data.text:
Friday, July 28, 2017 Lincoln, NH – FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE: Beloved Family Show Annie, The Musical at Jean’s Playhouse in August

Jean’s Playhouse presents Annie, The Musical written by playwright Thomas Meehan and composed by Charles Strouse.

With pluck and positivity, little orphan Annie charms everyone’s hearts despite a next-to-nothing start in 1930s New York City. She is determined to find her birth parents who left her at a New York city orphanage run by the evil Miss Hannigan. Helped by her fellow orphans, Annie escapes Miss Hannigan’s orphanage and finds a new home with billionaire Oliver “Daddy” Warbucks, his personal secretary Grace Farrell, and a lovable mutt named Sandy.

Don’t miss out on the Jean’s Playhouse debut of local canines Cleo and Fanny as Sandy the dog!

The seven-time Tony award-winning show Annie, The Musical will play at Jean’s Playhouse August 2-19 with the show times of:

Opening Night Wednesday, August 2 at 7:30 PM (join us for champagne and desserts to meet the cast and crew after the show!)

Tuesdays, Thursdays, Fridays and Saturdays at 7:30 PM

and Wednesday matinees on August 9 and 16 at 2:00 PM

Jean’s Playhouse wants to help you save a few bucks! We will be running a food drive for discounted tickets to Annie, The Musical to help support families in need. For every non-perishable food item that is brought in, we will discount $1 off your ticket (up to $5).

Jean’s Playhouse will also be presenting You’re a Good Man, Charlie Brown written by playwright Clark Gesner. Come see a day in the life of America’s lovable loser and his friends, the Peanuts gang. You’re a Good Man, Charlie Brown opens on Wednesday, August 23 at 7:30 PM! Other great times to come see the show are Thursdays, Fridays, and Saturdays at 7:30 PM through September 9, or 2:00 PM matinee showings on Wednesday, August 30th and September 6th.

Tickets can be purchased at the box office window. Tickets are also available now online at www.jeansplayhouse.com or by phone at 603-745-2141. Prices are $30 for adults, $25 for seniors, and $16 for students/children.

Jean’s Playhouse is a non-profit performing arts center that operates the professional Papermill Theatre and IMPACT Children’s Theatre Companies in the summer and fall and the community Playhouse Players and Jean’s Teens theatre companies in the winter and spring. Jean’s Playhouse also offers a limited year-round guest artist series of magicians, comedians and musicians. Jean’s Playhouse is located at 34 Papermill Drive in Lincoln, adjacent to RiverWalk Resort at Loon Mountain off I-93 Exit 32. Visit JeansPlayhouse.com or call 603-745-2141 for more information.

############

Attached Photo Caption: Aileen Quinn as Annie with her mutt Sandy from the 1982 film Annie
